title: Train Fault on East West Line causing delays

title_translations.zh-Hans: 东西线列车故障导致延误
title_translations.ms: Gangguan Kereta di Laluan Timur Barat menyebabkan kelewatan
title_translations.ta: கிழக்கு மேற்கு பாதையில் ரயில் பழுது காரணமாக தாமதங்கள்

updates.text: [EWL] CLEARED: Train services from #Redhill towards #Clementi are now operating normally.
[EWL] UPDATE: Estimate 10 mins additional travel time from #Redhill towards #Clementi due to train fault.
[EWL]: Estimate 15 mins additional travelling time from #Redhill to #Clementi towards JooKoon due to train fault.
